oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Import - Implementation rules, reasons and concerns
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schmid, Otto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This presentation covers the new import regulations for organic products in the framewok of the revision of EU regulation 2092/91.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schmid, Otto (2008) Import - Implementation rules, reasons and concerns. Speech at: BioFach Congress 2008, Nuremberg, Germany, February 21-24, 2008. [Unpublished]
